title: Rescuing Zoe
description: An alternative cover edition for this ASIN can be found hereThe last thing Zoe expects during Spring Break is to be trapped in a shipping container with a dozen other girls.One phone call changes my entire life.My best friend’s little sister is missing, kidnapped off the streets of Cancun.He needs my special skill set to bring her home.A former Navy SEAL, I’m now a Guardian, a brotherhood of men dedicated to rescuing those who’ve been taken.Rescuing Zoe should be just another job, but Zoe and I share a history.One her brother doesn’t know about.She’s been in love with me since she was five.It began as an annoyance, but a year ago I set her straight.She crawled into my bed and I broke her heart.I walked away.But now?Now, I’ll do anything to bring her home.
author: Ellie Masters
